metadata.title: CVE-2022-36788 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the TriangleMesh clonefunctionality of Slic3r libslic3r 1.3.0 and Master Commit b1a5500. Aspecially-crafted STL file can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attackercan provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: slic3r package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
